turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, could you help me with ordering pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one, I just want pepperoni. On the second, I'd like sausage and onions. And on the third, I'd like a veggie lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 large pizzas, 1 pepperoni, 1 sausage and onions, and 1 veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $72, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like those the crust on the pizza to be gluten free, does that have any charge?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it is $1 additional bringing it to $75, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like pick up, delivery or dine in?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's great. Thank you so much for your help. I appreciate it.
